accurate_docstring: When the light is on and the door is open, turn on the TV and close the door. Or if the door is open, close the door.
When it is Friday, send my friend an email and plus the invite times. If he doesn't reply, plus the reject time and if the reject time equal the invite time, send he another email.
Turn off your lights when one tap on your phone button.
When there is movement at the entrance, turn on the voice assistant and broadcast the weather.
Control the Christmas lights, play Merry Christmas music, change the ambiance lights and control the projectors.

If movement is detected at the side door (groom’s entrance), adjust the top lights 1, 2, 3 to 4500K, control the sound system to play the music ‘Love so sweet’ for 10 seconds; if movement is detected at the main door (bride’s entrance), adjust the top lights 4, 5, 6 to 3500K, control the sound system to play the music ‘Ave Maria’ for 10 seconds; whenever the hallway sensor detects movement, turn on the floor lights, and turn them off after 2 seconds; maintain the air conditioning temperature at 23°C; 5) turn on the fragrance diffuser
docstring: A romantic Western-style wedding featuring cool-toned lighting. Different music accompanies the entrance of the groom and bride. Lights change with movement, maintaining a comfortable temperature and introducing fragrance.
general_docstring: A romantic Western-style scene with the entrance of the groom and bride

accurate_docstring: The air conditioning temperature is stabilized at 23℃.Turn on the aroma diffuser.If the main entrance detects movement, turn on all lights and adjust them to a warm 1000K light, play the song
and display a digital photo album on the screen with each photo rotating every second.
docstring: In a cozy birthday party, the lights turn warm, Happy Birthday song plays, an electronic album rotates on the screen, and the temperature is comfortable with a pleasant aroma.
general_docstring: Warm birthday party with lights, music, and rotating album.

accurate_docstring: When the entrance sensor detects someone entering, if the gym was previously unoccupied, turn on the lights, smart sockets for gym equipment, set the fan to 1000 RPM, and broadcast “Welcome”. Increment the occupancy counter.When the exit sensor detects someone leaving, if there is only one person in the gym, turn off the lights and smart sockets for gym equipment, and broadcast “Have a good day”. Decrement the occupancy counter.Turn on the air purifier.
docstring: In the gym scene, when entering, turn on the lights, smart sockets, fan, and play a welcome message. When leaving, turn off the lights, smart sockets, and play a goodbye message. Keep the air purifier on
general_docstring: Gym with automated control of lights, equipment, and ventilation, with welcome and goodbye voice prompts.

accurate_docstring: Morning wake-up scene: play gentle music, open the curtains, start the coffee machine, adjust to soft lighting, and turn on the air purifier.
docstring: Morning wake-up scene: play gentle music, open the curtains, start the coffee machine, adjust to soft lighting, and turn on the air purifier
general_docstring: Smart home morning wake-up: music, curtains, coffee, lighting, air purification.
